subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: When Padraig Harrington begins his defense of the P.G.A. Championship title at Hazeltine National Golf Club, Tiger Woods will be on his mind, as well as on the same tee.
snippet: When Padraig Harrington begins his defense of the P.G.A. Championship title at Hazeltine National Golf Club, Tiger Woods will be on his mind, as well as on the same tee.
